dct_description_sm: F. Morellon la Cave Sculp; L.F.D.B. inv.
California shown as an unlabeled island on a small double hemisphere map at bottom right.
Title page with a decorative crest in center with scientific illustrations surrounding it. Map is shown on a banner at bottom right with a solar chart on banner at bottom left.

Title on banner at page top. "NULLIUS IN VERBA" on scroll beneath crest. At page bottom is a cartouche with this text: Cette illustre Societe A la droite Raison rend un fidele hommage. On n'y connoit d'autre esclavage, Que le joug de la Verite. B.L.M.
dct_creator_sm: Cave, Fran√ßois Morellon La, active approximately 1700-1766
